posts.post_title: F/S Group of 4 1910 Obak SGC   SOLD THANKS
posts.post_content:
For Sale:  Group of 4 SGC 20 1910 Obaks.   SOLD!  Thanks!
Perrine "None Better"
Martinke  "Always with Mouthpieces"
Weed "Paper Crimped"
Swander "Convenient Sensible"

If interested, please email me at [url]kindlercrew@gmail.com[/url] or Private Message me.  PAYMENT BY CHECK OR MONEY ORDER ONLY PLEASE.    Sorry the scan of the backs is a "reverse negative" The backs listed by the players are correct.  The scan makes it look like the opposite.  It reminds me of that 1990 Juan Gonzalez Donruss reverse negative!
Thanks,
Tim
